page.title: 18Estate Agents - Buntingford
page.content:
We visited several Estate Agents, to find out about how houses are bought and sold. W.H.Lee and Pat Whitacker were very helpful. Although the kinds of house they sell are slightly different, we discovered that their total yearly sales were similar. No particular training is necessary to become an estate agent. The most popular kind of house, and the easiest to sell, is the three-bedroomed semi-detached kind. The new estates in Buntingford have contained a lot of these. At present they cost from Â£48,000 upwards. A new, 4-bedroomed detached house costs over Â£80,000. The most difficult kind of house to sell is a very old, very big and dilapidated house.
Karen James and Wendy Strachan
